page.title: 03News for August in E.Cdr./Kn
page.content: {BARBECUE East Calder community are holding a family barbecue,on FRI 23rd of AUG at Almondell Country Park.Proceeds will go to the centre's funds.Prices are Â£1 for adults and 50p for children and OAPs.This pays for two hamburgers and sausages. {APOLOGY The East Calder OAPs have received an apology from Scottish Ominibuses for the breakdown of two of the buses at Dundee. {DISEASE Because of the rain there has been an outbreak of Dutch Elm Disease down Almondell. {FESTIVAL} Kirknewton Flower Festival raised a total of Â£1850 from the 31 arrangments to go towards the church funds.{ { By Craig Strickland}&{Grant Muir
